instruction: Universal Music Group (UMG) is a record label and music publishing company. It is the parent organization of various music brands and business divisions, and it is owned by the Vivendi media conglomerate. The company was founded by Jacques Salzmann and Georges Salzmann in 1931, and its headquarters are located in Santa Monica, California. UMG distributes music through various channels, including physical and digital formats, and its CEO is Lucian Grainge. The company has a significant presence in the global music industry, employing numerous artists, musicians, and staff members.
